sourceString: This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes.
targetString: Nidaamkani wuxuu u baahan yahay in ladhaqo gacmaha iyo gacanta inta hore illaa xusulka, inta badan 2-6 daqiiqadood.
en-mt: This procedure requires washing the hands and hands from the front up to the elbow, usually 2-6 minutes.

sourceString: Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary.
targetString: Mudada dheer oo la isku xoqo (10 daqiiqo) looma baahna.
en-mt: Long-term scraping (10 minutes) is not necessary.

sourceString: When rinsing, water on the forearms must be prevented from running back to the hands.
targetString: Markii la biyo raacinaayo, biyaha gacmaha dhudhuka waa in laga hortago intaysan dib ugu dhicin gacmaha.
en-mt: When rinsing, the water in the hands of the hands should be prevented from falling back into the hands.

sourceString: After hand-washing is completed, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is donned.
targetString: Kadib marka la dhameeyo maydhista gacmaha, gacmaha waa in lagu nadiifiyaa more nadiif ah iyo waa in marada qaliinka la xidhaa.
en-mt: After finishing the hand wash, the hands should be cleaned more clean and the surgical cloth should be worn.

sourceString: To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person.
targetString: Si loo yareeyo faafitaanka jeermiska, waxaa wanaagsan in la dhaqo gacmaha ama la isticmaalo jeermis ka dilaha gacmaha kahor iyo kadib marka loo adeegayo qofka xanuunsanaya.
en-mt: To reduce the spread of germs, it is a good idea to wash hands or use a hand disinfectant before and after serving the sick person.

sourceString: For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%.
targetString: Si loo xakameeyo caabuqa staphylococcal ee isbitaalka, waxaa la ogaaday faa'dada ugu badan ee gacmo dhaqida inay ka timaado dhaqida hore boqol kiibo 20%, oo waxaa laga dheefaa wax yar marka dhaqida joogtada ahi ay ka badato boqol kiiba 35%.
en-mt: To control staphylococcal infections in the hospital, the greatest benefit of hand washing was found to come from early 20% of the washing, and it is digested slightly when regular rinsing exceeds 35%.

sourceString: Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap.
targetString: Ku dhaqida saabuunta caadiga ahi waxa ay sadex jibaar gaarsiisaa kala qaadida xanuunada caabuqa bakteeriyada ee cuntada marka loo eego ku dhaqida sabuunta jeermiska disha. Marka la barbar dhigo gacmo ku masixida aalkolada iyo gacmo ku dhaqida saabuunta bakteeriyada disha ee wakhti dhaxaad ah ilaa 30 ilbiriqsi mid walba waxaa lagu arkay in aalkolada lagu masaxo gacmuhu ay bakteeriyada hoos u dhigaan boqol kiiba 26% marka loo eego saabuunta jeermiska disha.
en-mt: Rinsing with regular soaps is three times more common in the spread of bacterial infections in food than by washing it with germ-killing soap. Compared to hand-rubbing alcohol and hand-washing with antibacterial soaps in the middle of up to 30 seconds each observed that alcohol rubs in the hands reduce bacteria by 26% per cent compared to disinfectant soap.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: Laakiin saabuunta iyo biyaha ayaa ka waxtar badan alkohoosha gacmaha lagu masaxo yaraynta H1N1 hargabka A fayruska ah iyo Clostridium hoos u dhiciisa gacmaha. Wax ka qabadka nadaafada gacmaha ee bahdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaad waxa ku jiri kara barista shaqaalaha gacmo maydhiga, kordhinta helitaanka alkohoosha gacmaha lagu masaxo, iyo qoraalka iyo hadalka xasuusinta shaqaalaha.
en-mt: But soap and water are more effective than alcohol rubs on the hands in reducing H1N1 A virus and Clostridium reduction in the hands. Addressing hand hygiene in the health care sector may include teaching staff to wash hands, increasing access to alcohol to rub hands, and writing and talking reminders to employees.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: Waxaa loo baahan yahay daraasad dheeraad ah oo lagu sameeyo kuwan ka ugu haboon habdhismeedka daryeelka caafimaadka ee kala duwan.
en-mt: Further studies are needed to do these most suitable for different health care structures.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: Dalalka soo koraya, gacmo ku maydhashada saabuunta ayaa loo yaqaan inay tahay ka ugu jaban, oo ah shay daruuri ah oo lagu gaadho caafimaad wanaagsan, iyo xataa nafaqada wanaagsan.
en-mt: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is known to be the cheapest, a cloudy item for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: Laakiin, maadaama oo ay ku yar yihiin biyuhu, saabuun iyo ama xarumaha farxalku ee guryaha dadka, dugsiyada iyo goobaha shaqada waxaa ku adag in laga dhabeeyo habdhaqanka farxalka ee caalamiga ah.
en-mt: But, as there is little water, soap and or hand washing stations in people's homes, schools and workplaces it is difficult to realise universal hand washing behavior.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, badanaa miyiga Afrika waxaa ku yar tuubooyinka lagu farxalanayo ee gaar loo leeyahay ama suuliyaasha shacabka ku garab yaala way yar yihiin, in kasta oo ay tahay ikhtiyaarka ugu jaban ee jira in la dhiso meelo lagu farxasho.
en-mt: For example, in most rural Parts of Africa there are few private hand washing pipes or thumbs alongside citizens, though it is the cheapest option there is to build hand washing stations.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: Laakiin, farxal yaraantu waa habdhaqan laga dhaxlay saabuun iyo biyo la'aanta ka jirta.
en-mt: However, hand washing is a behavior inherited from soap and water shortages.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: Wacyi gelinta iyo u ololeynta farxadka iyada oo saabuun la isticmaalayo waxa ay saamayn kartaa go'aamada xeerka, waxa ay abuuri kartaa wacyi gelin ku saabsan faa'dada farxalka oo waxa ay keeni kartaa is badal habdhaqanka ah oo mudada dheer ah oo shacabka ah.
en-mt: Awareness and advocacy of happiness through soap can affect regulatory decisions, it can create awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavioural change in the population.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: Si tan si wax ku ool ah loo gaadho, waxaa loo baahan yahay kormeer iyo qiimayn.
en-mt: To achieve this effectively, monitoring and evaluation are required.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: Qiimayn lagu sameeyay 70 daraasadood ayaa lagu ogaaday in qaababka bulshada ku salaysan uu wax ku ool yahay kordhinta farxalka ee LMICs, halka ololaha ka dhaadhicinta bulshadu aanu waxtar badan lahayn. Hal tusaale oo wacyi gelinta farxalka ah ee dugsiyadu waa "Qaabka Sadexda Xidigood" ee UNICEF kaas oo ay ku dhiiri gelinayso dugsiyada inay qaadaan talaabooyin fudud, talaabooyin aan qaali ahayn si loo xaqiijiyo in ardaydu ay ku farxashaan saabuun, iyo sidoo kale shuruudo kale oo nadaafada ah.
en-mt: An assessment of 70 studies found that community-based models were effective in increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social downsizing campaigns were not very effective. One example of hand washing awareness in schools is UNICEF's "Three Star Model" in which it encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students are hand washing with soap, as well as other hygiene requirements.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: Marka heerka ugu yar la gaadho, dugsidu waxa ay meesha ka saarayaa sadexda xidigood ee ugu sareeya.
en-mt: Once the minimum level is reached, the school eliminates the top three stars.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: Samaynta meelo lagu farxasho waxa ay qayb ka noqon karaan ololaha wacyi gelinta farxalka ee la qaadayo si loo yareeyo xanuunada iyo dhimashada ilmaha.
en-mt: Setting up hand washing stations can be part of the hand washing awareness campaign that is being undertaken to reduce the illnesses and deaths of babies.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: Maalinta Caalamiga ah ee Farxalka waxaa weeye tusaale kale oo lagu samaynayo wacyi gelin taas oo lagu doonayo in lagu badalo habdhaqanka. Safmarka coronavirus 2019-20 dartiis, UNICEF waxa ay wadaa olole lagula qabsanayo farxalka.
en-mt: International Hand Washing Day is another example of awareness raising which seeks to change behavior. Due to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF is conducting a campaign to adapt to hand washing.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: Dhawr daraasadood ayaa lagu eegey qaab jaban oo farxalka dalalka soo koraya  looga sameeyo oo la xidhiidha DALYs dabelkeeda.
en-mt: Several studies have looked at a cheaper way of hand washing in developing countries related to DALYs on its jaws.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: Si kastaba ha noqotee, hal mid oo kamid ah kuwa lagu taliyay ee dhiirrigelinta gacmo-dhaqashada saabuunku ay aad uga qiimo badan tahay waxtarka ka badan waxqabadyada kale ee biyaha iyo fayadhowrka.
en-mt: However, one of the recommended ones for promoting soap handwashing is far more valuable for effectiveness than other water and sanitation activities.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: Muhiimiyada uu farxalku u leeyahay caafimaadka bila aadamka – gaar ahaan dadka ku jira xaalada nugul sida hooyada iminka dhashay ama askarta dhaawactay ee ku jira isbitaalada – ayaa markii ugu horeesay la aqoonsaday bartamihii qarnigii 19-aad oo waxaa aqoonsaday laba hogaamiye oo nadaafada gacmaha ah: Dhakhtarka Hangari u dhashay ee Ignaz Semmelweis oo ka shaqayn jiray Vienna, Awstariya iyo Florence Nightingale, oo Ingiriis ahaan "aas aasihii kaaliyaha caafimaadka casriga ah".
en-mt: The importance of hand washing for human health – especially for people in vulnerable conditions such as the newborn mother or wounded soldiers in hospitals – were first recognized in the mid-19th century by two leaders of hand hygiene: the Hungarian-born physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna,  Austria and Florence Nightingale, in English "the founder of the modern medical assistant".

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: Waqtigaas badanaa dadku waxa ay aaminsanayaayeen in caabuqa uu keeno urta loo yaqaan miasmas.
en-mt: At that time often people believed that infections were caused by an odor called miasmas.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: 1980yaadkii, caabuq ka dhashay cuntada iyo daryeelka caafimaadka caabuq la xidhiidha ayaa keeney in Xarunta Xakamaynta iyo Kahortaga Xanuunada Maraykanka inay si firfircoon u bilawdo wacyi gelinta nadaafada gacmaha taas oo markaa ah qaab muhiim ah oo lagaga hortago faafitaanka caabuqa.
en-mt: In the 1980s, food and health care-related infections prompted the U.S. Center for Disease Control and Prevention to actively begin awareness of hand hygiene which was then an important way to prevent the spread of the infection.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: Safmarkii hargabkii swine ee 2009-kii iyo safmarka COVID-19 ee 2020-ga ayaa kordhiyay wacyi gelinta dalal badan oo ah muhiimiyada ku faraxalashada sabuunta si markaa la iskaga ilaaliyo xanuunada.
en-mt: The 2009 Swine fever epidemic and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 have increased awareness among many countries about the importance of spreading the disease in order to protect against disease.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: Tusaale ahaan, waraaqo ku saabsan "farsamada saxda ah ee farxalka" ayaa lagu soo dhajiyay farxalka agtiisa meelaha suuliyada dadka ka dhaxeeya iyo suuliyada dhismayaasha xafiisyada iyo madaarada Jermalka.
en-mt: For example, papers on "proper hand washing technique" were posted next to hand washing in the positions of responsibility between people and the responsibilities of office buildings and airports in Germany.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: Xakmaynta khatarta goobta shaqada ee COVID-19 waxaa weeye barnaamijyo lagu dabaqayo amaanka shaqada iyo qaabka caafimaadka ee loo xakamaynayo waxyeelo si looga hortago xanuunka coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).
en-mt: Limiting workplace risks to COVID-19 is a set of programs to apply workplace safety and health frameworks to curb harm to prevent the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Qaabka saxda ah ee xakamaynta khatarta goobta shaqadu waxay ku xidhan tahay goobta shaqada iyo shaqooyinka, waxay ku xidhan tahay qiimaynta khatarta ee isha meesha uu qofka kasoo gaadhi karo, inta uu le'eg yahay xanuunku bulshada dhaxdeeda, iyo xaaladaha khatarta ee shaqaalaha shakhsiyaadka ah kuwaas oo u nugul inay qaadaan COVID-19.
en-mt: The correct workplace risk control model depends on the workplace and the occupations, depending on the risk assessment of the source of the person's potential exposure, how much illness is in the community, and the risk conditions of individual employees who are more susceptible to contracting COVID-19.

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: Sida ay sheegeen Maamulka Caafimaadka iyo Amaanka Shaqada Maraykanka (OSHA), marka uu yaraado khatarta inuu dadka soo gadho isaga oo shaqada ku jira waxay yaraynaysaa in shaqada lagu kala qaado shacabka iyo daka wada shaqaynayaayi, taas oo loo baahan yahay talaabooyin aas aasiga ah oo lagaga hortagayo faafitaanka caabuqa, oo ay ku jiraan gacmo maydhis, ku dhiiri gelin shaqaalaha inay gurigooda joogaan hadii ay xanuunsanayaan, qabaan xanuun neefsiga ah, oo ay si joogto ah nadaafada ugu dadaalaan oo ay jeermiska ka dilaan goobta shaqada.
en-mt: According to the U.S. Department of Health and Employment Security (OSHA), the less the risk of people coming to work will reduce the spread of work between the public and the co-workers, which requires basic measures to prevent the spread of infection, including hand washing, encouraging employees to stay at home if they are sick,  have respiratory pain, and they are constantly trying to clean up and killing germs in the workplace.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Khatarta waxoogaaga ah ee shaqada waxaa kamid ah dadka looga baahan yahay inay dadka aan la garaynin ama looga shakisan yahay COVID-19 inay macaamilaan ama u dhawaada, laakiin ay dhici karta inuu ka qaaday caabuqa bulshaamada inta uu u socdaalay dibada.
en-mt: Some risks to work include people who are required to deal with or near people who are not or suspected of COVID-19, but who may have contracted the infection from communities while traveling overseas.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Kuwaas waxaa kamid ah shaqaalaha ay isasoo gaadheen shacabka guud sida dugsiyada, deegaanada shaqo ee dadku ku badan yihiin, iyo tukaamada dadka badan.
en-mt: These include workers who have been reached by the general population such as schools, crowded working areas, and crowded shops.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Iska ilaalinta khatarta ee kooxdan, sidoo kale talaabooyinka kahortaga caabuqa ee aas aasiga ah, oo ay ku jiraan mishiinada neefsiga ee isticmaala hawo nadiifiyaha aadka u tayo sareeya, wax ka ilaaliya hindhisada dadka kale, iyo in la helo agabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed ee la heli karo hadii qofka ay isasoo gaadhaan cid qabta COVID-19.
en-mt: Risk protection for this group, as well as basic infection prevention measures, including respiratory machines that use high-quality air purifiers, protect against sneezes from others, and provide personal protective equipment available if the person is contacted by someone with COVID-19.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: OSHA waxay eegeysaa daryeelka caafimaadka iyo shaqaalaha waayeelka ah ee ay isasoo gaadheen cid aan la garanaynin ama dadka looga shakisan yahay COVID-19 waxaa loo arkaa inay tahay khatar sare, taas oo kordhinaysa khatarta hadii shaqaalaha uu qabto nidaam guud, ama uruurin ama ka shaqayn muunada ah, oo loo yaqaan ama looga shakiyo qofka inuu qabo COVID-19.
en-mt: OSHA is looking at health care and elderly workers who have been contacted by an unknown person or covid-19 suspects are considered to be a higher risk, increasing the risk if the employee has a general procedure, or collecting or working on samples, known as or suspected to have a person with COVID-19.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: Xakamaynta waxyeelada ee shaqaalahaas oo ay ku jiraan xakamaynta farsao ee qolka hawo nadiifiya ee cadaadiska negetifka, iyo agabka ilaalida shakhsi ahaaneed ee munaasabka ah ee shaqada.
en-mt: Damage control for these workers including mechanical control of the air purifying room under negetif pressure, and personal protection equipment at work.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: Faafitaanka COVID-19 waxa uu ku yeelan karaa saamayn xun goobta shaqada.
en-mt: The spread of COVID-19 can have a negative impact on the workplace.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: Shaqaalaha waxaa dhici karta inayna ka maqnaanin goobta shaqada xanuun darteed, ay macquul tahay in loo baahdo inay daryeelaan mid kale, ama baqi inuu asiibi karo ah.

targetString: Qorshayaasha lagaag jawaabayo khatarta la xidhiidha goobaha shaqada ee kala duwan iyo shaqooyinka, oo ay ku jiraan meelaha laga qaadayo, xaalada khatarta ee ka imanaysa guriga iyo bulshada, iyo xaaladaha khatarta ee shaqada shakhsi ahaaneed sida da'da wayn ama mushkilada caafimaadka mudada dheer.
en-mt: Plans to respond to risks associated with a variety of workplaces and jobs, including where they are being taken away, the risk situation from home and society, and risk situations in personal work such as old age or long-term health problems.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: Waxa ay sidoo kale sheegaan daruuriyaadka lagaga jawaabayo khatarahaas, iyo qorshaha lagu baxsanayo hadii xaalad ka timaado safmarkan.
en-mt: They also state the clouds to respond to these risks, and the plan to escape in the event of a situation in this conflict.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: Qorshayaasha u diyaar garawga iyo jawaabta xanuunada caabuqa waxa dhici karta inay ka waajibaan ama ay badalaan talooyinka.
en-mt: Preparedness plans and response to infections may be mandatory or change recommendations.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: Jawaabta wax ku oolka ah ee faafitaanka xanuunka waxaa kamid ah yaraynta isku gudbitna ee shaqaalaha, ilaalinta dadka ku jira khatarta ugu badan ee inuu saamayn caafimaad daro xun ku yeesho, in la wado shaqada ganacsi, iyo in la yareeyo saaayta xun ee shirkada kale ee wax laga iibsado.
en-mt: The effective response to the spread of the disease includes reducing the transmission of employees, protecting people at the highest risk of adverse health effects, running business work, and reducing the negative impact of other companies.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.

targetString: Sida ay u kala sareeyaan xakamaynta waxyeelada waxa nidaam shaqo u tahay isticmaalka balaadhan ee amaanka iyo caafimaadka shaqada ee xakamaynta khatarta kooxeed si wax ku ool ah.
en-mt: According to their classification of harm control what a working system is a working system for the broad use of safety and occupational health in group risk control effectively.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: Halka aan la xadidi karin waxyeelada COVID-19, qaabka ugu wax oolsan ee loo xakamayn karaa waa in la sameeyo xakamayn, uu daba socdo xakamaynta maamulka, iyo ugu danbayntii agabka ilaalada shakhsi ahaaneed.
en-mt: Where the side effects of COVID-19 cannot be limited, the most effective way to control it is to establish control, follow administrative control, and ultimately personal surveillance equipment.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: Samaynta xakamaynta waxaa kamid ah in shaqaalaha laga xidho khatarta waxyeelo ee shaqada iyada oo aan la isku halaynaynin habdhaqanka shaqaalaha, waxaana uu noqon karaa qaabka ugu kharashka yar ee xal ah ee la dhaqan gelin karo.
en-mt: Making controls include shutting employees out of the risk of harm at work without trusting employee behavior, and it can be the least cost-effective form of solutions that can be implemented.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: Xakamaynta maamulku waxaa weeye is badal nidaamka ama xeerka ah kaas oo uga baahan shaqalaaha ama cida loo shaqeeyo inay talaabo qaado.
en-mt: Administrative control is a change in the system or regulation that requires employees or employees to take action.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: Agabka ilaalinta shakhsi ahaaneed (PPE) waxaa loo arkaa inay ka waxtar yar yihiin samaynta iyo dhaqan gelinta xakamaynta, laakiin waxay kahortagi karaan caabuqyada qaar.
en-mt: Personal protective equipment (PPE) are considered less effective in formulating and implementing control, but can prevent some infections.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: Nooc kasta oo PPE ah waa in lagu doortaa khatarta shaqaalaha, inay si wanaagsan ugu galaan oo ay munaasab yihiin (sida, neefsiga), in si joogto ah oo munaasab ah loo xidho, si joogto ah loo baadho, hagaajiyo, oo loo badalo, oo si haboon la iskaga saaro, nadiifiyo, oo loo kaydiyo ama tuuro si markaa looga hortago in caabuq ay keenaan.
en-mt: Any type of PPE should be chosen based on the risks of employees, to get in well and be appropriate (such as, respiratory), to be permanently and conveniently shut down, regularly searched, adjusted, and replaced, and conveniently removed, cleaned, and stored or discarded to then prevent infections from causing them.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: Sida ay dhigayaan Maamulka Caafimaadka iyo Badbaadada Shaqada Maraykanka (OSHA), shaqooyinka khatarta yar waxay ay yihiin isasoo gaadh dadka oo yar iyo dadka wada shaqaynayaayi.
en-mt: According to the U.S. Occupational Health and Safety Administration (OSHA), low-risk jobs are a relatively low-risk and co-worker.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: Talaabooyinka kahortaga xanuunka ee aas aasiga ah ee lagula taliyo dhamaan goobaha shaqada waxaa kamid ah in si joogto ah oo wanaagsan  loo maydho gacmaha, in shaqaalaha lagu dhiiri geliyo inay joogaan guriga hadii ay xanuunsanayaan, qabaan xanuun neefsiga ah oo ay ku jirto inay afka iyo sanka qabsadaan hadii ay qufacaan oo ay hindhisaan, in la siiyo kilinigis iyo salada qashinka, loo diyaariyo inay meel kale kasoo shaqayn karaan ama in shaqada la isku habeeyo wakhtiyada lasoo galayo hadii loo baahdo, in laga wacyi shaqaalaha inay wada isticmaalaan agab iyo qalab, iyoinay si joogto ah u nadiifiyaan iyo jeermiska uga dilaan goobta shaqada.
en-mt: Basic pain prevention measures recommended in all workplaces include washing hands regularly and well, encouraging employees to stay at home if they are sick, having respiratory pain including catching mouth and nose if they cough and sneeze, giving clinics and litter salads,  prepare them to work elsewhere or to arrange the work at the same time, if necessary, to inform employees to use equipment and equipment together, and to clean and kill germs in the workplace regularly.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: In markaba la soo saaro oo meel lay aysoleet gareeyo shakhsiga laga yaabo inuu keeno caabuq taas oo ah talaabo muhiim ah oo markaa lagu ilaalinayo shaqaalaha, macaamiisha, booqdayaasha, iyo dadka kale ee goobta shaqada jooga.
en-mt: To immediately remove and place an individual who may cause an infection which is an important step in protecting employees, customers, visitors, and other people in the workplace.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: Xarunta Kahortaga iyo Xakamaynta Xanuunada Maraykanka (CDC) waxay ku talinaysaa in shaqaalaha qaba calaamada xanuunka daran ee neefsiga inay joogaan gurigooda ilaa inta ay ka baaba'ayso xumadu, raadka xumadu, iyo calaamado kale ugu yaraan 24 saacadood iyaga oo aan isticmaalin dawooyinka yareeya ama wax ka badala xumaha, iyo inay leeyihiin xeer fasaxa xanuunka oo dabacsan, kaas oo u ogolaanaya shaqaalaha inay joogaan gurigooda oo ay daryeelaan cidii xubinta qoyska ah ee xanuunsanaysa, iyo in shaqaalaha ay ka warqabaan xeerarkan.
en-mt: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees with severe respiratory symptoms stay at home until the severity of the deformities, traces of malformation, and other symptoms are eliminated for at least 24 hours without using medications that reduce or modify the fever, and have a flexible pain leave rule, which allows employees to stay home and care for whoever is a sick family member,  and that employees are aware of these rules.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: Sida ay dhigayso OSHA, shaqooyinka leh khatarta yar waxaa kamid ah kuwa dadku si joogto ah isasu gaadhaan ama macaamilka la isku jirsanayo wax ka yar lix fuudh (1.8 m) dadka aan la garanaynin ama looga shakiyo inay yihiin bukaan COVID-19, laakiin ay dhici karto inay qabaan SARS-CoV-2 maadaama oo uu yahay xanuun ku faafa oo ka jira aaga ganacsigu ku yaalo, maadaama oo shakhsi u socdaalay meel kale oo kamid ah meelaha looga shakiyay COVID-19 baahintiisa.
en-mt: According to OSHA, occupations with low risks include those where people regularly reach out or interact with each other for less than six foot (1.8 m) for people who are not known or suspected to be COVID-19 patients, but who may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 as it is a contagious disease in the commercial area,  as an individual traveled to another area of the suspected COVID-19 coverage.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: Kuwas waxaa kamid ah shaqaalaha tagay meelaha shacabka sida dugsiyada, meelaha shaqada ee aadka u saxmada badan, iyo meelaha ay dadku ku badan yihiin ee tukaamada. Samaynta xakamayntu tan iyo kooxaha khatarta badan ku jira waxaa kamid ah in la sameeyo hawo nadiifiye tayo sareeya, la kordhiyo xadiga hawo nadiifinta, samayn wax u dhaxeeya sida caag la iska dhax arkayo oo qabta hindhisada, iyo lala sameeyo daaqad qofka gaadhigiisa isaga oo ku jira loogu adeego. Kamaynta maamulka ee tan iyo kooxda khatarta badan ku jirta waxaa kamid ah in lagu dhiiri geliyo shaqaalaha xanuunsanaya inay gurigooda joogaan, ay ku badalaan kulanka foolk-foolka ah maqal iyo muuqaal, in la habeeyo wakhtigan shaqada, in la joojiyo wixii socdaal ah ee aan daruuriga ah ee meelaha uu ka jiro COVID-19, in la sameeyo qorshe xidhiidh xaalada degdeg ah oo ay ku jirto in laga wada hadlo shaqaalaha walaacaalooda, in la siiyo shaqaalaha macluumaadkii ugu danbeeyay iyo in lagu tabo baro xaaladaha khatarta COVID-19 iyo habdhaqanka ilaalinta, lagu tobobaro shaqaalaha cida ay tahay inay isticmaasho dharka ilaalada iyo qalabka sida loo isticmaalo, in la siiyo khayraad iyo deegaan shqo oo markaa horseedaysa nadaafada shakhsi ahaaneed, in lagu khasbo gacmo maydhiga joogtada ah, xadidaada macaamiisha iyo dadka soo gali kara goobta shaqada, iyo in lasoo dhigo calaamado gacmo nadiifin ah iyo talaabooyinka lagaga hortago COVID-19. Taas oo ku xidhan shaqada, shaqaalaha ay yartahay inuu soo gaadho waxaa dhigi kara inay u baahan karaan inay xidhaan agabka ilaalinsha shakhsi ahaaneed oo ay ku jiraan isku darta golofis, dirayska, waji gashad, ama wajiga inay xidhaan, ama muraadayo.
en-mt: These include employees who have visited public places such as schools, highly precise workplaces, and public places in the shops. sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.

targetString: Maadaama oo helitaanka PPE uu yar yahay calaamka, WHO waxay ku talinaysaa in la yareeyo baahida loo qabo PPE taas oo ah in maqal iyo muuqaal dadka lagu daweeyo, wax loo dhaxaysiiyo sida daaqad nadiif ah, taas oo u sahlaysa dhamaan dadka ku lug leh daryeelka tooska ah ee gelitaanka qolka uu ku jiro bukaanka COVID-19, in la isticmaali kaliya PPE daruuriga ah shaqooyinka gaar, in lasii wado isticmaalka isla waji gashadkaas iyada oo aan la iska saarin inta dhawrka bukaan loo adeegayo oo isku xanuun qaba, in lala socdo oo la isku duba rido iibka PPE, iyo in dadka laga wacyi geliyo inay isticmaalaan waji gashadka dadka xanuunsanaya.
en-mt: Since access to PPE is less symbolic, WHO recommends reducing the need for PPE which is to treat people with audio and video, something to be placed between as a clean window, making it easier for all involved in direct care of direct admission to the room where the COVID-19 patient is present,  to use only cloud PPE for specific tasks, to continue the use of the same mask without removing the few patients who are serving the same disease, to monitor and duplicate PPE sales, and to inform people to use face masks for the sick.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.

targetString: Awood uma lihin joojinta faafitaanka xanuunkan, laakiin waanu garanaynaa qaabka la isku halayn karo ee lagaga jawaabayo garawsha , qada shaqaynta iyo bulshada caalamka dhisideeda taas oo markaa hawlbawle u ah hay'adan.
en-mt: We do not have the power to stop the spread of this disease, but we know the reliable way to respond to the crisis, the working environment and the building of the international community which is then the function of this institution.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.

targetString: Waxa ay i xasuusiyeen sida ay caalamka wax ku ool ugu tahay in wakhti xaadirkan ay galaan Wikipedia, iyo calaamada awooda badan ee ay u tahay isha macluumaadka muhiimka ah inay online ku jirto oo markaa ay heli karaan dhamaan.
en-mt: They reminded me of how effective it is for the universe to enter Wikipedia at this time, and the powerful sign that it is the source of important information to be online and then accessible to all.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.

en-mt: All of our employees, employers, and employees under contract:

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: waxa aanu maalintii shaqayn doonaa 4 saacadood, ama 20 saacadood todobaadkii ilaa inta wargelin kale ay soo baxayso.
en-mt: we will work 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until another notification comes out.

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: Ma bayaaminayno fasax - hadii aad shaqayn karto saacadaha caadiga ah, oo shaqada laguu adeegsan karo.
en-mt: We don't assess a holiday - if you can work during normal hours, and you can be used to work.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Laakiin, caalamka lama saadaalin karo wakhti xaadirkan, oo hadii aad u baahan tahay inaad daryeesho qof qoyska ah, inaad soo iibsato cunto, ama aad qabato dhakhtarka, badqabkaaga ayaa mudnaantaada ah.
en-mt: But, the universe cannot be predicted at this time, and if you need to take care of a family member, buy food, or take care of the doctor, your safety is your priority.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Lama soconayno wakhtigaaga.
en-mt: We are not following your time.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Hadii aad xanuunsanayso, ha shaqaynin.
en-mt: If you're suffering, don't work.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Anaka oo carabaabayna, laakiin odhanayna.
en-mt: And we did not say,

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Looma baahna maalmod fasax xanuun ama PTO in la dalbado - kaliya u sheeg maamulahaaga oo kooxdaada ka caawi inay jadwalkooda habaystaan oo ay markaa u sameeyaan wakhti ay shaqooyinka muhiimka ah loo qabto.
en-mt: There's no need for sick leave days or PTO to apply – just let your manager know and help your team streamline their schedule and then make time for important jobs.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: (Hadii lagaa talo COVID-19, fadlan u sheeg Bryan ee T&C Ops loo yaqaan T&C ayaa kaa caawin kara taageerada oo markaa xaqiijinaya in xaaladaada sida haboon laguu fiirsado si loo maamulo).
en-mt: (If you are advised of COVID-19, please tell Bryan's T&C Ops called T&C can help you with the support and then ensure that your situation is properly considered for management).

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: Mushaharka saacadaha si buuxda ayaa loo bixin doonaa.
en-mt: Hourly wages will be paid in full.

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Waxa aanu hore u nidhi, oo nagala go'an in aanu u hogaansano cida aan heshiiska kula jirto iyo saacadaha shaqaalaheena.
en-mt: What we have already said, and we are determined to comply with our agreement and the hours of our employees.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Qof kasta waxa lagu siin doonaa mushaharka saacadiihii caadiga ahaa ee uu shaqayn jiray ee xaaladaha caadiga ah.
en-mt: Everyone will be paid for their regular hours of work in normal conditions.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Taas waxa kamid ah hadii aad xanuunsato oo aanad shaqayn karin.
en-mt: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Hadii aad doonayso inaad shaqayso, waanu ku caawin doonaa.
en-mt: If you want to work, we will help you.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Dad badan ayaa u adeegsada shaqada qaab ay isku buuqa iskaga yareeyan ee caalamka ku xeeran.
en-mt: Many people use work in a way that reduces the noise of the world around them.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Waxa bixinayaa abaal marin cajiib ah, gaar ahaan wakhtiga noocan oo kale ah.
en-mt: It offers a wonderful reward, especially at such a time.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Mar kale ayaan ku celinayaa, tani waa daryeelka naftaada.
en-mt: I repeat again, this is taking care of yourself.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Kaliya waxa aanu dalbaynaa waa inaad la xidhiidho maamulahaaga, si markaa aanu u ogaan kartno waxa aanu filan karno oo markaa u habayn karno shaqada.
en-mt: All we demand is that you contact your manager, so that we can then know what we can expect and then arrange the work.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Shaqooyinka qaar ayaa loo arkaa inay daruuri yihiin.
en-mt: Some jobs are considered cloudy.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Waxaa jira waxyaabo ay tahay inaynu sii wado qabashadooda.
en-mt: There are some things we have to keep grasping about.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Kalsoonida & Amaanka, iyo Dhaqaale uruurinta kooxda (iyo waxyeebo kale) ayaa ah shaqooyinka daruuriga ah ee markaa u baahan taageerada dheeraadka ah.
en-mt: SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Security, and Team Fundraising (among other things) are the cloud jobs that then need additional support.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Waxa aanu bilaabi doonaa nidaamka dhamaan waaxaha si markaa aanu u heli karno ujeedooyinka wakhtigan oo markaa diirada u saari karno taageerada shaqooyinkeena daruuriga ah.
en-mt: We will start the system in all departments so that we can then get to the objectives of the moment and then focus on supporting our cloud jobs.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Waxaa jira wax badan oo nooloo qaban karo, waxa aanu kaliya diirada saari doonaa mashaariicda daruuriga ah.
en-mt: There is a lot that can be done alive, we will just focus on cloud projects.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: In iminka la yareeyaa waxyaalo hadhaw ah keeni mayso.
en-mt: It will not bring about a reduction in the amount of things that will lead to it.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Ma qorshaynayno in "laba jeer la galo shaqada" marka uu xanuunka laga gudbo.
en-mt: We don't plan to "go into work twice" once the pain is overcome.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Lagaagama fadhiyo in aan shaqayso wakhti dheeraad ah si aad wakhtiga shaqada ku eeg tahay aad ugu dhamayn karto taas oo aan wakhtigan macquul ahayn.
en-mt: It is not up to you to work overtime so that you can complete your working time which is impossible nowadays.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Waxa aanu aqbalnay in xaaladu ay isbadalshay, oo waxa aanu samayn doonaa bartilmaaeed csuub iyo wakhti munaasab ku ah.
en-mt: We have accepted that the situation has changed, and we will do it in a proper time.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Maxaa ku dhacay APP (Qorshaynta Sanadkii)?
en-mt: What happened to APP (Planning for the Year)?

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Si loo habeeyo waaqiciga cusub iyo shaqada maalintii ee saacadaha la filanayo, waxa aanu qorshaynaynaa in la habeeyo wakhtiga lagu bixinayo Qorshaha Sanadkii ee 2020-2021.
en-mt: In order to streamline the new era and daytime work in the expected hours, we plan to customize the time provided in the 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Waxa aanu doonaynaa in aanu soo jeedino kordhin qorshaha 2019-2020 si markaa wakhti loo siin karo miisaaniyada si shaqaalaha loogu ogolaado inay mudnaanta siiyaan shaqooyinka daruuriga ah, daryeelka nafta, iyo daryeelka qoyska inta lagu jiro qaabilaada dadka u baahan ama doonaya inay shaqeeyaan wakhti kayar intii hore dhawrka todobaad ee soo socda.
en-mt: We want to propose an extension to the 2019-2020 plan so that time can then be given to budgets to allow employees to prioritize cloud jobs, self-care, and family care during the reception of people who need or want to work less than ever in the next few weeks.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Waxa uu kordhinta wakhtigani aad u yaraynayaa culayska shaqada ee qorshaha wakhtigan iyo cadaadiska hay'ada oo dhan.
en-mt: It extends this time period very much reducing the workload of the plan at this time and the pressure on the entire institution.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Waxa aanu bari doonaa qorshaheena Gudida todobaadka soo socda oo waxa aanu cusboonaysiin doonaa wakaalada iyo kooxaha talaabooyinka xiga sida ugu dhakhsaha badan ee aannu u xaqiijino.
en-mt: We will teach our plans to the Board next week and update the agencies and teams on the next steps as soon as we confirm them.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Waad ku mahadsan tahay kooxda APP ee hogaanka arrintan.
en-mt: Thank you to the APP team for leading this.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Xaalada xafiiska, soo gaadhida iyo nadiifinta.
en-mt: Office status, reach and clearing.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, waxa aanu ogaanay in mid kamid ah shaqaalaha SF ka shaqeeyaa ay dhici karta inuu asiibay fayruska COVID-19.
en-mt: Last week, we learned that one sf worker could have been infected with the COVID-19 virus.

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Laakiin, iyada oo laga xatadirayo, waxa aanu shaqaalaysiinay koox jeermiska ka disha xafiiska San Francisco o dhan.
en-mt: But, under the aemploying, we have hired a team that kills germs throughout the San Francisco office.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Ka faa'idaysiga dawada jeermiska disha ee loogu talo geley isbitaalakada si jeermiska looga dilo meelaha la taataabto, iyo sidoo kale qaybta soo dhawaynta iyo wiisha lagu tago dabaqyada.
en-mt: Taking advantage of a disinfectant for hospitals to kill germs in touch areas, as well as the reception and elevators section on floors.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Dhismaha waxa uu leeyahay nidaam daryeelka ah oo markaa looga faa'idaysan karo taageerada amaanka ee dadka kiraystayaasha ah.
en-mt: The building has a welfare system that can then be utilized for the security support of tenants.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Waxa aanu ku kalsoonahay in xafiisku uu diyaar inoo noqon doono marka aanu doono in aanu kusoo noqono.
en-mt: I am confident that the office will be ready for us when we want to return.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Xafiiskeena DC waxa uu ku yaalaa WeWork, kaas oo nala wadaagay nidaamkiisa COVID-19 naaka iyo dhamaan shaqaalaha DC ka shaqeeya.
en-mt: Our DC office is located on WeWork, which has shared with us its COVID-19 nanaka system and all DC staff.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay, xafiiskeena DC waxaa loo wareejiyay in gebi ahaanba guriga laga soo shaqeeyo taas oo waafaqsan tilmamaamaha ay la wadaageen San Francisco.
en-mt: Last week, our D.C. office was moved to work completely from home in line with the same guide they shared with San Francisco.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Sida ay yaqaanaan qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena NYC, waxa aanu sidoo kale ka wada hadlanay sidii loo kiraystan lahaa meel Brooklyn ah.
en-mt: As some of our NYC staff know, we also discussed how to rent a place in Brooklyn.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Wada hadalkaasi uu socda laakiin dib ayuu u dhacay.
en-mt: This discussion is ongoing but it has been delayed.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Qaar kamid ah shaqaalaheena ayaa meel kale kasoo shaqaynaya markii ugu horeysay.
en-mt: Some of our employees are working elsewhere for the first time.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Shaqaalaheena mudada dheer guriga ku dhax shaqaynaya ayaa garanaya in aan taas habeyn karno, oo waxa aanu doonaynaa in talin qaar kaa siino:
en-mt: Our long-term employees who work at home know that we can do that overnight, and we want to give you some advice:

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Waxa aad wakhtiga kulanka kusoo koobtaan hal ama ugu badnaan labba saacadood.
en-mt: The meeting period is limited to one or at least two hours.

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Hadii loo baahan yahay madal ka dheer, waxa aad isla eegtaan inaad u jaajbisaan mudo dhawr ayaamood ah.
en-mt: If there is a need for a longer platform, you should look at it for a few days.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Kulanka sida cad loo cadeeyay, waa inaad yeelataa ajande, oo soo dir warbixin lasii akhriyo arka hore.
en-mt: For the meeting that has been clearly made clear, you must have an agenda, and send a report to read and see.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Waxa aad samaysaa fiidyaw toos ah, oo waxa aad isticmaashaa agabka sida Google Docs iyo Zoom si markaa loo fududeeyo oo loo xidhiidhitaa.
en-mt: You make live videos, and you use tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate and connect.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Waxa aad hogaamisaa fududaynta kulan kasta, qof ayaa la soconaya wada sheekeysi wixii su'aalo ah oo markaa la socona liiska dadka hadlaya, oo qof ahaa ka caawin doona qaadida qoraalada (ama inuu isku daro qoraalada la qaaday).
en-mt: You lead the facilitation of each meeting, someone is accompanied by a conversation of any questions and then accompanies a list of speakers, and someone who was will help pick up the notes (or to combine the notes taken).

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Waxa aad soo dirtaa iimeel waaxda taageerada farsamo hadii aad u baahan tahay sameedo haboon.
en-mt: You send an email to the technical support department if you need appropriate facilities.

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Waxa aad isticamashaa nususaacahaaga wanaagsan.
en-mt: You use your good half.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Waxa aad ka qayb gashaa #remoties idaacadaha aha ee Slack ee wada hadalka dadka la wada shaqeeyo ee ku saabsan qaybinta shaqada
en-mt: What you attend #remoties on Slack's radio stations in a conversation with co-workers about job distribution

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Kooxda Shaqada Waaxda Shaqaalaha ayaa eegaya tilmaamo webinar ah oo markaa lagu kordhinayo taageerada qaybinta shaqada ee Aas Aasiga ah.
en-mt: The Department of Labor task force is looking at webinar guidelines to then increase support for the division of work at The Foundation.

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Todobaadkii lasoo dhaafay waxa aanu ka dalbanay bulshada inay helaan joojinta munaasabadaha deeqda lacagta Wikimedia, sida tafatirka, ilaa inta ay WHO ku dhawaaqayso in safmarku uu dhamaaday.
en-mt: Last week we demanded the community to get a stop to Wikimedia money donation events, such as editing, until the WHO announces that the trip is over.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Waxa aanu u sheegnay in aanu fahanay in dalabkeenii la joojiyay iyo xadidaadaha kale ee markaa lagu soo rogi karo ei markaa loo buuxiyo deeqa ay ogolaaday hawlaha ah iyo in aan cidna ayna ku mudan ciqaab dib u dhiga ama wax ka badalka yoolashan.
en-mt: We told them that we understood that our offer had been suspended and other restrictions that could then be imposed on ei when the grant was filled out for the activities authorized and that no one deserved punishment for delaying or changing these goals.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Todobaadka soo socda waxa aanu raaci doonaa tilmaamo dheeraad ah oo Wikimenia ah iyo deegaamada kale iyo shirarka bulshada ee heerkulka ah.
en-mt: Next week we will follow additional guidelines for Wikimenia and other communities and community meetings at temperatures.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Qaabka guud ee bulshooyinka caalamka waxa aad moodaa inay murugo  leedahay khalkhalka laakiin waxa aanu aaminsanahay bayaaminta iyo awooda diirada lagu saarayo bulshadooda, Wikimedia iyo sida kale.
en-mt: The general pattern of global communities seems to be sad about the chaos but we believe in the assessment and capacity of the focus on their community, Wikimedia and so on.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Marka lagasii socdo, CRT waxay ka shaqaynaysaa inay samayso bog Meta-Wiki ah si loo bixiyo meelo bulshada ah oo lagula soconayo saamaynta iyo la socodka xidhiidhka aanu la leenahay.
en-mt: In the process, CRT is working to set up a Meta-Wiki page to provide community spaces to monitor the impact and monitor our relationship with them.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: La socodka wixii arrimo ah ee la xidhiidha COVID-19
en-mt: Monitoring any issues related to COVID-19

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Waxa aanu soo diri doonaa casuumad Khamiiska soo socota, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT kulan shaqaalaha oo gaar ah.
en-mt: We will send an invitation next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Waxa aanu uga faa'idaysan doonaa wakhtigaas in aanu bixino macluumaadka dheeraadka ah, ka jawaabto su'aalo oo aan wakhti dheeraad ah gelino in dadka kale aanu isku xidhano.
en-mt: We will use that time to provide the additional information, answer questions and put more time into connecting with others.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Waynu ku wada jirnaa oo waxaynu gacan uga gaysan doonaa si kasta.
en-mt: We are in it together and we will contribute in any way.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa kuusii soconaya in macluumaadku uu kaasoo gaadho iimeelkan, iyo wixii kale ee daruurigaah ee macluumaadka la xidhiidha COVID-19, ee Xafiiska Wiki.
en-mt: At this time, you are going to have information that reaches this e-source, and any other cloud of information related to COVID-19, in the Wiki Office.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: CRT ayaa ka shaqayn doona gelinta bogagan iyo dhamaan macluumaadka oo hal meel ah.
en-mt: The CRT will work on the insertion of these pages and all the information in one place.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: Waxa aanu sidoo kale ka shaqaynaynaa in aanu xidhiidhka joogtayno shaqaalaha degan dalalka wakhti xaadirkan uu saamayn wayn uu ku yeeshay.
en-mt: We are also working to maintain contact with employees living in countries that have had a significant impact at this time.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Hadii aad qabto wax su'aalo ah, oo ku saabsan socdaal, munaasabado, baahinta tooska ah ee shaqada ee waawayn, ama cabaqado internetka ah, ama wax kale oo aad u baahan tahay, fadlan haka gaban inaad wargeliso oo aad la shaqayso CRT.
en-mt: If you have any questions, about immigration, events, live coverage of the work in large areas, or online complaints, or anything else you need, please do not hesitate to inform and work with CRT.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Waxa aanu halkan u joognaa in aanu ku caawino oo aan kuula shaqayno sida loogu baahdo.
en-mt: We are here to help you and work with you as needed.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Hadii aad hayso arrin sir ah ama xasaasi ah, fadlan iimeel ugu dir Bryan Judan - Maamulaha Shaqala Caalmaka ee Waaxda Shaqaalaha.
en-mt: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please send an email to Bryan Judan - Global Employment Manager at the Department of Labor.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Waxba kamid ah isbadalan waa in aan loo arag culays shaqadeena ah iyo waajibaadkeena.
en-mt: None of these changes should be seen as a burden of our work and obligations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Laakiin, waxaa weeye aqoonsiga wakhtigan, oo shaqooyinka iyo waajibaadka waxa ay u badan tahay inay la qabsan doonaan sidii horena ay ula qabsadeen.
en-mt: But, that is, the identity of the present, and the jobs and duties will probably adapt to the same as before.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Waxaa jira talaabooyin aanu u aragno inay daruuri u yihiin taageerada dhaxdeena si markaa aaun usii wadno shaqada, oo uu dhaqaaqeenu u bixiyo taageero ee ay u baahan yhiin, iyo caalamka adeega ay ku tiirsan yihiin.
en-mt: There are steps that we consider to be necessary for the support of our community to continue the work, and our move provides the support they need, and the world of service on which they depend.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Shaqadeena qorshaysan waxa ay halkaa ugu sugnaan doontaa marka wakhtigeedu yimaado.
en-mt: Our planned work will be there when its time comes.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Wakhti xaadirkan, waxa la gaadhay wakhtigii uu midba midkeena kale taageeri lahaa oo aynu samaynsan lahayn makaanka shaqooyinka muhiimka ah ee todobaadyada iyo bilaha soo socda.
